name: 劉立雯
objective:
認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。

This course helps students  familiarize with the syntax, style, and organization used in English research papers.

113-1 課程規則

1. 每次上課均點名兩次
2. 上課前點名出席且下課前點名出席，且有個人紙本教材者，該次上課視為出席且加分
3. 上課前點名未出席但下課前點名出席者 該次上課視為遲到，不加分但承認該次上課出席
4. 上課前點名出席但下課前點名未出席者該次上課視為早退，不加分但承認該次上課出席
5. 上課前點名未出席且下課前點名未出席者 視為該次上課缺席不加分
6. 上課無個人教材者不加分
7. 考試違規與否由監試教師認定
8. 監試教師認定該次考試違規後，該次考試成績零分
9. 學期總成績由所有考試 (包括期中期末考) 的平均分數加上出席率加分以及上課優良表現及優良作業加分而成
10: 補考：補考缺席視為放棄補考機會，分數以原成績計算
A: 補考 Test 1: 於期中考 (考 Test 2 時), 補考 Test 1, 缺考者將無法補考 Test 1
B. 補考 Test 2: 於考 Test 3 時，補考 Test 2, 缺考者將無法補考 Test 2
C. 補考 Test 3: 於考期末考 Test 4 時，補考 Test 3, 缺考者將無法補考 Test 3
D.. 補考 Test 4: 於第 18 週，補考 Test 4, 缺考者將無法補考 Test 4

11. 補考該 (幾) 次成績及格 ( 60 或以上) 時，成績以 70% 認定，補考該 (幾) 次成績不及格 ( 59 或以下) 時，成績則以原始分數記算，且本科目學期總成績至多為 70 分
12. 因公假而補考者之成績則仍以 100% 認定但需出示授課教師認定之有效學校公假單
13. 學生因故晚註冊導致課程內容接收缺失而致成績損失者，請自行負責

113-1 Class Rubrics: 
1.	The class roster will be called twice during each class session.
2.	Those present in the classroom, both before the class begins and before the class ends, and with their class material in paper form, will be considered attending the required class session and be rewarded one bonus point.
3.	Those who are not present in the classroom before the class begins but are present before the class ends will be considered late for the class session and will not be rewarded any bonus points.
4.	Those who are present in the classroom before the class begins but are not present before the class ends will be considered as having left early for the class session and will not be rewarded any bonus points
5.	Those not present in the classroom, either before the class begins or before the class ends, will be considered absent from the class session and will not be rewarded any bonus points.
6.	A bonus point will only be awarded to those with class materials.
7.	It is the discretion of an exam proctor to decide whether academic misconduct has occurred. 
8.	If an exam proctor identifies academic misconduct, a zero will be given on the exam.
9. The final semester grade is composed of the average of the total number of tests, including the midterm and final exam, plus the bonus points for total attendance in class and extra credits on outstanding class performance or homework
10. Make-up test rules: Those who qualify for a make-up exam but do not show up on time will be considered as having been allowed to take the make-up exam, and their final grade will be their original grade.
A: To make up Test 1: During the midterm exam (when taking Test 2), make up Test 1; those who missed it will be unable to make up Test 1.
B. To make up Test 2: When taking Test 3, make up Test 2; those who missed it will not be able to make up Test 2.
C. To make up Test 3: When taking the final exam, Test 4, make up Test 3; those who missed it will not be able to make up Test 3.
D. To make up Test 4: During week 18, make up Test 4; those who missed it will be unable to make up Test 4.	
11.	The make-up exam score will be counted as 70% of the original score if it exceeds 60, but it will remain as it was when it is below 60. And the semester final grade for those who take the make-up exam will be 70 at most even if it exceeds 70 after make-up exam score is taken into account. 

12.	After presenting the school absence note to the class teacher, Those who missed their exam (s) due to official absences will receive their original score instead of 70% on make-up exams.

13. Late registrators are responsible for their grade point loss
